content: --उत्तर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [उत्तरस्मादुत्तरः] {1} more and more, higher and higher, further and further. {2} successive, ever increasing; °स्नेहेन दृष्टः <ls>Pt. 1</ls>; <ls>Y. 2. 136.</ls> (--रं {1} a reply to an answer, reply on reply; अलमुत्तरोत्तरेण <ls>Mu. 3.</ls> {2} conversation, a rejoinder. {3} excess, exceeding quantity or degree. {4} succession, gradation, sequence. {5} descending. (--रं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} higher and higher, in constant continuation, more and more; उत्तरोत्तरमुत्कर्षः <ls>K. P. 10</ls>; उत्तरोत्तरं वर्धते <ls>H. 1.</ls>
